configuration.stem: Why do you think the parts of the body have such differences? Write an argument to explain the differences in the sensitivities of the different body parts of the body.
configuration.recommended answer: this is optional recommended answer text
configuration.feedbackText: The most sensitive body parts are those that are used to gather the most information about the environment. Very sensitive fingers, toes, and lips enable a person to know whether something that is being touched or eaten is harmful. A personâ€™s toes help with balance, so a person must be aware of any unevenness of the land. Other body parts like the forearm, back, and calf do not need as much sensitivity because people do not usually them to sense the external environment
